name: Hommage by Julius Kwasi Wisdom Adorsu

metadata.name: untitled 1
metadata.description: I went to a place where the sand meets the sky, a desolate land vast enough to foster my aspirations. An oasis to realize my visions, and to stand toe to toe with my predecessors. A manifestation of what I had learned from the greats, pouring everything I had into stepping beyond their shadow. To create a series that was masterful.
